QuestData.Title: Disarming the Enemy
QuestData.Description: If we are to stop the poachers, we need to take more aggressive action.$B$BIf we can remove the enemies' primary tools for killing and capturing serpents, we may be able to stop their operation altogether.$B$BI need you to go into their territory on the eastern end of Windward Isle and steal their weapons.$B$BA cat without claws cannot strike.
